import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Actions/Resource View" />

# Resource View Action
	
```jsx
const DefaultViewRenderer = R.curry((ViewForm, props) => (
	<ResourceViewRenderer {...props}
	                      fieldMapper={useDefaultResourceFieldMapper}
	                      tabMapper={useDefaultViewTabMapper}
	                      ViewForm={ViewForm}/>
));

const ResourceViewAction = (props) => {
	const {
		title,
		variant = 'dialog',
		submitLabel,
		ViewForm = ResourceViewForm,
		ViewRenderer = DefaultViewRenderer,
		ViewTitle = ResourceViewTitle,
		...otherProps
	} = props;

	const scrollableRef = useRef(null);

	const resolveViewPort = R.cond([
		[R.equals('dialog'), R.always(DialogViewPort)],
		[R.equals('sidebar'), R.always(DrawerViewPort)],
	]);

	const ViewPort = resolveViewPort(variant);

	return (
		<ViewPort {...otherProps} ref={scrollableRef} submitLabel={submitLabel} ViewForm={ViewForm}>
			{(Content) => {
				const View = ViewRenderer(Content);

				return <View {...otherProps} title={title} TitleComponent={ViewTitle} scrollableRef={scrollableRef}/>;
			}}
		</ViewPort>
	);
};

const ResourceViewAction = R.curry((settings, props) => <ResourceViewAction {...settings} {...props}/>);
```
